## Project: Perfume Dupe Comparison Website

This is a Next.js website focused on finding and comparing affordable alternatives (dupes) for popular designer perfumes.

**Tech Stack:**
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React

**Project Focus:**
- Perfume listings with detailed information
- Dupe comparison features
- Search and filter functionality
- Modern, user-friendly UI similar to Fragrantica.com
